name: Functional Test Engineer
description:
Nauchsoft is looking for Functional Test Engineer.

We are a 750-employee IT company headquartered in the US (Dallas area), having offices in Belarus, Latvia, Lithuania, UAE, Finland, Ukraine. We have been in the IT business for 34 years and continue growing.

Location: Belarus.

In this role, you will be responsible for test design, test planning, and test execution of software delivery, including end-to-end lifecycle testing, by working closely with a project team to deliver solution of the highest quality.

Your Role:

  • Planning and estimating tests workload, ability to define test plans that describe the testing approach;
  • Design, develop, execute, and maintain end-to-end workflow tests including functional, integration, and regression test suites based on business requirements;
  • Participate in troubleshooting and triaging of issues to drive towards root cause identification and resolution;
  • Provide quality status at key milestones through the project and test summary reports at the conclusion of each release via test reports;
  • Manage test environments (deployment using Installation Instructions, application customization, test users configuration);
  • Provide continuous improvement on the testing process and way of working.

Requirements:

  • 2+ years of Quality Assurance;
  • Deep interest in software quality and testing methodologies;
  • Functional / technical design and related industry business processes experience, translatable into relevant use cases and test scenarios definition and creation;
  • Proven ability to deliver high quality results autonomously and to prioritize multiple responsibilities;
  • Strong critical thinking skills and organizational skills with excellent communication skills, both oral and written.

We offer:

  • Opportunity for professional self-realization and growth;
  • Remote work;
  • Medical insurance;
  • Friendly team, you may consult with colleagues and get help;
  • Competitive salary;
  • 25-days of paid vacation;
  • 100%-paid sick leave;
  • Foreign language courses and other corporate programs;
  • Bonuses in case of wedding or a child’s birth.
